professional: Solutions Architect with over 10 years of experience and a strong affinity towards providing solutions and products based on business needs, return on investment, scalability, and technical debt elimination. Proven success in strategically aligning IT Solutions and products with IT and Business Operations in the areas of networking, cloud, and collaboration.

descriptions.description: Design and maintain various aspects of the AWS environment to enable
descriptors: Implementation of scalable and repeatable design for centralized services in each region
Utilization of AWS Transit Gateways for network core, inter-region, and inter-account network connectivity

Utilization of AWS CLI to aggregate information across all accounts

descriptions.description: Responsible for network design and architecture for all facilities, site-to-site connectivity, and cloud (AWS) connectivity.
descriptors: Implementation of more robust switching infrastructure to include core and distribution layers for campus and large facilities to utilize L3.

Implementation of IDS/IPS

Globally Managed 750+ Cisco Meraki Wireless Access Points

descriptions.description: Responsible for wireless design for facilities and warehouses to ensure current and future network capacity expectations remove operational roadblocks.
descriptors: Implementation of 802.1x utilizing Windows NPS for private wireless authentication

Utilize Ekahau AI Pro to create wireless predictives
Utilize Ekahau AI Pro to assess wireless performance based on capacity expectations (current and future)
Utilize Ekahau AI Pro to optimize channel planning and recommended disabling of radios as well as channel width reocmmendations
Utilize Ekahau AI Pro to optimize WAP placement
Utilize Ekahau AI Pro to visualize different antenna types (omni directional and directional) to aid in both performance and cost optimization

descriptions.description: Responsible for design of new remote access solutions (Cisco AnyConnect) for enhanced security and manageability.

descriptors: Implemntation of GitHub repository for Network Engineers to store and update scripts
